title: Biden’s Budget Calls for Increase in Defense Spending, Including Funds for Ukraine - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Biden’s Budget Calls for Increase in Defense Spending, Including Funds for Ukraine  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Biden proposes new minimum tax on billionaires, unrealized gains  Fox Business
  3. Biden's $5.8T budget proposes one of the 'largest' investments in US national security amid war in Ukraine  Fox News
  4. President Biden pitches minimum tax on billionaires in new budget  Reuters.com
  5. Biden Unveils Federal Budget Proposal: Live Updates  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: President Biden released a $5.8 trillion budget that envisions a substantial increase in defense spending, including aid to Ukraine, a sign of the administration’s willingness to devote additional resources to military programs.
